Package net.apartium.cocoabeans.tab

Class TabList<P>

java.lang.Object
net.apartium.cocoabeans.tab.TabList<P>
Type Parameters:
P - type of player
@AvailableSince("0.0.41") public abstract class TabList<P> extends Object
Represents a dynamic tab list header and footer system for a group of players.

The header and footer components are driven by an Observable API, which allows them to be automatically updated via a lazy-watching mechanism. The heartbeat() method should be called periodically (e.g., each tick or at intervals) to apply updates if the underlying data has changed.

  • Method Details

    • currentViewers

      protected Set<P> currentViewers()
      Returns the currently viewed players.

      This reads the last known value of the group watcher and returns an empty set if no value is present.

      Returns:
      the current set of viewers

    • isDirty

      protected boolean isDirty()
      Checks whether either the header or footer components have changed and requires updating.
      Returns:
      true if the header or footer is dirty (i.e., changed); false otherwise

    • heartbeat

      public void heartbeat()
      Triggers a heartbeat to update the tab list header and footer.

      This should be called periodically to ensure any updated observable values are applied And will also handle adding and removing viewers.

    • getViewers

      public ViewerGroup<P> getViewers()
      Returns the associated player group.
      Returns:
      the group of players for this tab list

    • set

      public void set(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component header, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component footer)
      Sets a static header and footer component.
      Parameters:
      header - the static header to use
      footer - the static footer to use

    • set

      public void set(net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> header, net.apartium.cocoabeans.state.Observable<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> footer)
      Sets observable sources for the header and footer.

      These sources can be dynamic and the tab list will update automatically when the observed values change.

      Parameters:
      header - an observable header
      footer - an observable footer

      public void delete()

    • sendPlayerListHeaderAndFooter

      protected abstract void sendPlayerListHeaderAndFooter(Set<P> viewers, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component header, net.kyori.adventure.text.Component footer)
      Sends the given header and footer components to the specified players.
      Parameters:
      viewers - the players to send the header/footer to
      header - the header component, or null to clear it
      footer - the footer component, or null to clear it
